stories.title: Eight skiers found dead after California avalanche
stories.summary: Fifteen skiers went missing on Tuesday following a massive avalanche in California's Lake Tahoe region. One person remains missing but is presumed dead.

stories.title: Trump says UK’s Starmer making ‘a big mistake’ with Chagos Islands deal
stories.summary: The US president warned the military base on Diego Garcia may be needed to respond to possible attack from Iran.

stories.title: Billionaire Les Wexner tells US lawmakers he was 'naive' and 'conned' by Epstein
stories.summary: Testifying before Congress, the former CEO of Victoria's Secret lingerie brand accused Epstein of stealing "vast sums" of money from his family.
